revised_title: Discovery of a New Compound of Oxymuriatic Gas and Oxygene Gas
tldr: Humphry Davy discovers a new compound of oxymuriatic gas and oxygene gas, which is highly explosive and decomposes when exposed to heat or certain metals. The explosive gas is analyzed, and its properties and reactions with other substances are studied, providing insights into the nature of chemical combinations and the behavior of gases.
